about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate software engineer with over 5 years of experience building web applications and custom software solutions. I specialize in creating scalable, performant applications that solve real-world problems.

projects.label: Projects completed from concept to production

mission.title: What Drives Me
mission.description: What drives me is creating practical technology that makes life easier and solving problems through code. I enjoy turning ideas into tools that people can actually use.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.description: Technologies and tools I use to build modern applications

latestProjects.title: Latest Projects
latestProjects.description: Explore my recent work showcasing modern web applications and innovative solutions

1.title: Frontend Development
1.description: Built responsive web apps (Next.js, TS/JS) for smooth UX and modern UI aesthetics.

2.title: Backend Development
2.description: Developed APIs and server-side logic (Node.js/Express.js); managed database integration.

3.title: Graphic Design
3.description: Created branding, marketing assets, and digital graphics using Adobe Suite, Figma, and Canva.

4.title: WordPress Developer
4.description: Designed custom WordPress sites, portfolio, plugins and scheduling apps with tailored, responsive functionality.

1.title: Planning & Analysis
1.description: I analyze project goals, target users, and technical requirements to define a clear scope and strategic plan that guides development.

2.title: Design
2.description: I create mockups and prototypes that align with user needs and brand identity, ensuring an intuitive and visually appealing interface.

3.title: Development & Testing
3.description: I build the application using modern technologies, writing clean and maintainable code, followed by rigorous testing to ensure quality and performance.

4.title: Deployment & Maintenance
4.description: I deploy the application to production, monitor its performance, and provide ongoing support and updates to ensure smooth operation.

projects.pageDescription: A comprehensive collection of my work including web applications, mobile apps, and innovative digital solutions

1.title: React Movie App
1.description: A movie discovery web app featuring trending films, detailed info, and search functionality using a public movie API.

2.title: Xora Landing Page
2.description: A visually captivating landing page for a digital agency built with modern web technologies.

3.title: Awwwards Winning Website
3.description: A creative showcase website inspired by Awwwards design standards with smooth interactions and animations.

4.title: 3D Portfolio
4.description: A 3D interactive portfolio website integrating Three.js and React Three Fiber for immersive visuals.

5.title: Travel Agency Dashboard
5.description: A full-featured admin dashboard for managing travel bookings, clients, and destinations.

6.title: Record Share Platform
6.description: A web platform for sharing and discovering audio recordings, podcasts, and music tracks.

7.title: Kemali Clinic
7.description: A professional medical clinic website with appointment booking and services showcase.

8.title: AI Resume Analyzer
8.description: An AI-powered web app that analyzes resumes and provides improvement suggestions using NLP.

9.title: Nike E-Commerce
9.description: A Nike-inspired e-commerce web app with product filtering, cart, and checkout functionalities.

chatToMe.title: Chat to me
chatToMe.description: I'm here to help and answer any question you might have. I look forward to hearing from you!

form.consent: I agree to be contacted regarding my message.

success.title: Message sent successfully!
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.

fullName.min: Full name must be at least 2 characters

message.min: Message must be at least 10 characters

consent.required: You must agree to be contacted
